review_1: This game is a super fun cover-shooter with movie-themed levels. Very polished and very, very fun for a few hours with a friend. The only thing this is missing is more levels and randomized enemy spawns. It is very quick to learn the 9 (?) few-minute-long levels and remember where all the danger spots are. The RPG is always in that window, etc. But the game is very cheap, so worth it hours / dollar. DEVS: you have a solid platform here. Just give us some DLC (I'll happily pay!) and a randomizer / horde mode!! (Users please upvote if you agree. :)
review_2: If you get motion sickness from FPS games that require you to move and tilt the camera and all that, then this is the game for you. You can literally sit or just stand while playing. Co-op is fun and simple. Great point and shoot while having the ability to crouch and dodge without having to get too physically involved.
